Brendon Moeller - The Erratic Podcast

Sunday, February 10, 2013

The Erratic Podcast

Stumbled across this on Soundcloud last year, what an awesome mix!!! Really interesting beats and percussion, deep and dubby tracks one minute then quite banging techno the next, with effects bubbling all over the shop. Inspired me to search out and explore that other sub genre of techno called dub techno.

Comments

Advanced Ballistic Missile Site - Grand Forks

Sunday, February 10, 2013

This looks like something from a Sci-Fi novel, rendered all the more striking in black and white.
This is an abandoned US anti-ballistic missile system, Stanley R. Mickelsen Safeguard complex in Nekoma, North Dakota, USA. The Safeguard Program was a United States Army anti-ballistic missile system developed in the late 1960s. Safeguard was designed to protect U.S. ICBM missile sites from counterforce attack, keeping the option of an unimpeded retaliatory strike.

I wonder what Aliens will think of this in few hundred thousand years if they come across it?

More info http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anti-ballistic_missile
